lines: Sorry, you're still too young for this experience.  Come back later.
Sorry, you're too old for this experience.

Your Biology teacher is breezing through the miraculous inner workings of the common cockroach, BLABERUS CRANIFER. It is enough to make you lose your lunch. You can't understand a word he is saying, but everyone else seems to be
nodding and following along. What will you do?

Your teacher is impressed by the fact that you thought enough of the subject matter to ask him to explain it so that you fully understand it. His explanation makes it almost barely understandable but at least that's enough
to get you through the next quiz.
He even gives you a few live souvenirs to take home and study on your own. What do you do with the souvenirs?
#PUT THEM IN MARY JANE'S LUNCH BAG
#SET THEM FREE IN THEIR NATIVE HABITAT (THE SCHOOL CAFETERIA)
Five minutes after lunch period begins you hear the desired result: "EEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEK!" Mission accomplished!
Yes, now they can be reunited with thousands of their relatives living comfortably and in high style in the school cafeteria.
Yawn...You'll probably understand it after you get the notes from...zzzzzz....
